meta.job_title: SaaS Online Customer Service Product Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the strategy, development, and enhancement of the online customer service platform.
Gain a deep understanding of the existing product features, positioning, and unique characteristics.
Develop and execute the product strategy for the SaaS online customer service platform.
Gather and analyze user feedback, conduct user testing, and leverage data analytics to continuously improve the product.
Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to develop effective go-to-market strategies and promotional campaigns.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, or a related field
